body.description: Provide a label `name`. Set `resource: true` for resource labels. Only resource labels have a `value` â€” if `resource: true`, include a `value`. Else, omit `value` from your request body.

resource.description: Set to true to create a resource label.

isDefault.description: Set to true to automatically apply this label to new resources.

schema.description: Request to create a new label in a workspace context.
schema.title: CreateLabelRequest
